content: Hi, Is there a way i can integrate HAPI with Postgres. Also is there a way, i can see where HAPI creates the data, posted through APIs on my local machine (i have installed HAPI cli on my local machine).

Is there a way i can integrate HAPI with Postgres.

is a bit vague. Please ask a more precise question.
You can configure the JPA data source using the PostgreSQL JDBC driver.
